dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am Vel'Zarath, the Ethereal Shadow Reaper. What brings a mere mortal like you to challenge me in my realm?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to bring light and hope back to the Necroshade Realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light and hope, such feeble concepts in the face of eternal darkness. You are a fool, unworthy of my attention.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My resolve is stronger than you think. I will not falter in the face of your darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Bold words from a fragile being. Your resolve will shatter like glass against the might of the Shadow Legion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight until my last breath, for the realm deserves a chance at peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your defiance is amusing, but ultimately futile. Prepare yourself for oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps you underestimate the power of unity and determination. We will not yield.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity and determination? Hah! Your optimism is misguided. You will learn the true meaning of despair.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Even in the darkest of places, there is always a glimmer of light. I will be that light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your naive idealism is pathetic. Darkness reigns supreme here, and your light shall be extinguished.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to let despair consume this realm. I will stand against you with all I have.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your stand is meaningless, a mere blip in the endless night. Prepare for annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The strength of hope can pierce even the deepest shadows. I will prove it to you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hope is a fragile illusion in the face of my power. Your delusions will be your undoing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come not to fight, but to understand the darkness that consumes this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding? You dare seek understanding from me? Ignorance is bliss, mortal. Prepare for your ignorance to be shattered.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Knowledge is the key to unlocking solutions. Let us find a way to coexist in this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? Such a quaint notion. There is no room for coexistence with the Shadow Legion. Prepare for your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps through understanding, we can find a way to bring balance to this land.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Balance? The only balance is the balance of power, and I hold all the power here. Your balance shall be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have come to put an end to your reign of darkness and restore peace to the Necroshade Realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Your words are as empty as the void itself. You will find no peace here, only eternal night.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The people of this realm deserve a chance at freedom from your tyranny. I will be their harbinger of hope.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hope? Hope is a pathetic sentiment, easily crushed by the weight of despair. You will bring nothing but despair.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Even in the darkest night, a single candle can light the way. I will be that candle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your light will sputter and die in the chilling winds of my darkness. Prepare for your flame to be extinguished.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight until the very end to bring back the light to the hearts of the people in this land.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your futile struggles will amuse me, mortal. But in the end, you will bow before the shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your darkness has no place in this realm. I will be the blade that cuts through the shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words, but foolish. The shadows are my domain, and you will find no victory here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand as the beacon of hope against your darkness. Prepare to face the light of justice.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Justice? There is no justice in the realm of shadows. Only eternal night awaits you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: In the name of those who suffer under your rule, I will bring an end to your tyranny.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Suffering is the natural order of things. Your feeble attempts at rebellion will only bring more suffering.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge your rule, Vel'Zarath. Darkness will not prevail as long as I draw breath.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenger? How amusing. Your defiance will crumble like sand against the might of the Shadow Legion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My will is unbreakable, my spirit unwavering. Prepare for a battle you will not soon forget.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, mortal. Your will shall break, your spirit shall falter. Prepare for your inevitable defeat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not stand idly by while you cast this land into eternal darkness. The time for change is now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Change? Change is an illusion, a fleeting dream in the face of unending night. You will know only darkness.
